name: Critical Match
description:
Press return to start the game. Arrow keys + A/S map to the NES dpad and A/B buttons.

A work in progress for the nesdev.com 2018 contest. http://forums.nesdev.com/viewtopic.php?f=34&t=17743

More information in my dev log here: http://forums.nesdev.com/viewtopic.php?f=34&t=18059

Download the game to get the NES rom to play in an emulator for a better experience!
